name: Baby Barbarian Metroidvania Game Teaser
description:
In a dungeon deep beneath Slapdash Castle, our hero, Brom Berrserk, wakes up alone, his family nowhere in sight. Cold and 'hangry', Brom must escape to reunite with his loved ones...but he's all alone.  Or is he...? Unleash your inner RAGE!
  • Based on the fantasy comic, Baby Barbarian, by Own Goal Books, this teaser video game combines a Metroidvania style game with light puzzle elements.
  • In-game features include four fully colored, rendered, and lettered pages from the successfully Kickstarted comic.
  • Experience the events of the comic as Brom as he figures out how to escape.  
  • A HUGE thank you to all of the Kickstarter backers! Without you - none of this would have been possible!  We had to give you credit... literally! (take a gander at the credits)
